bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the ongoing registration of domestic waste water systems and to eliminate the requirement to register by a prescribed date in order to enable all householders to register their domestic waste water systems.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le clárú leanúnach córas dramhuisce tí agus do chur deireadh leis an gceanglas atá ann clárú faoi dháta forordaithe d’fhonn a chumasú do na tíosaigh go léir a gcórais dramhuisce tí a chlárú.

debates.showAs: Housing (Housing Assistance Payment Waiting Times) (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2009, Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 and subsequent regulations to reduce social housing and housing assistance payment scheme assessment times.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na dTithe (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2009, Acht na dTithe (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2014 agus rialacháin dá éis sin chun na tréimhsí measúnachta a laghdú maidir le tithíocht shóisialta agus maidir leis an scéim um íocaíocht cúnaimh tithíochta.
bill.shortTitleEn: Housing (Housing Assistance Payment Waiting Times) (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na dTithe (Tréimhsí Feithimh maidir le hÍocaíocht Cúnaimh Tithíochta) (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha) (Leasú), 2021

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Children Act 2001 to permit the publication or broadcast of details pertaining to a person who has been charged with an offence against a child where that child is deceased, and to permit adults who were victims of an offence committed against them when they were a child to waive the anonymity provided for under the Children Act 2001.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na Leanaí, 2001 chun go gceadófar foilsiú nó craoladh mionsonraí a bhaineann le duine a cúisíodh i gcion in aghaidh linbh i gcás an leanbh sin a bheith éagtha, agus chun go gceadófar d’aosaigh ab íospartaigh chiona a rinneadh ina n-aghaidhnuair ba leanaí iad an anaithnideacht dá bhforáiltear faoi Acht na Leanaí, 2001 a tharscaoileadh.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit the sale of consumer goods packaging containing harmful plastics, to prohibit the sale of consumer products containing microbeads, to promote the use of biodegradable materials in the packaging of consumer products, to enable the Minister for Communications, Climate Action and Environment to make for that purpose certain regulations and to permit the Environmental Protection Agency to prepare programmes for monitoring the use of harmful plastics in the manufacture, distribution and sale of consumer products in the State.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc pacáistiú earraí tomhaltais, ar pacáistiú é ina bhfuil plaistigh dhochracha, a dhíol, do thoirmeasc táirgí tomhaltais ina bhfuil micreachlocha a dhíol, do chur úsáid ábhar in-bhithdhíghrádaithe chun cinn sa phacáistiú ar tháirgí tomhaltais, do chumasú don Aire Cumarsáide, Gníomhaithe ar son na hAeráide agus Comhshaoil rialacháin áirithe a dhéanamh chun na críche sin, agus do thabhairt cead don Ghníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil cláir a ullmhú chun faireachán a dhéanamh ar úsáid plaisteach dochrach le linn táirgí tomhaltais a mhonarú, a dháileadh agus a dhíol sa Stát.

debates.showAs: Housing (Housing Assistance Payment Waiting Times) (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2009, Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2014 and subsequent regulations to reduce social housing and housing assistance payment scheme assessment times.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na dTithe (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2009, Acht na dTithe (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2014 agus rialacháin dá éis sin chun na tréimhsí measúnachta a laghdú maidir le tithíocht shóisialta agus maidir leis an scéim um íocaíocht cúnaimh tithíochta.
bill.shortTitleEn: Housing (Housing Assistance Payment Waiting Times) (Miscellaneous Provisions) (Amendment) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na dTithe (Tréimhsí Feithimh maidir le hÍocaíocht Cúnaimh Tithíochta) (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha) (Leasú), 2019

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to confirm that the choral refrain, with or without the lyrics, of  "Amhrán na bhFiann" or, in the English Language, "The Soldier's Song" is and continues to be the National Anthem; to provide for a version of the National Anthem in the Irish Sign Language;  to confirm that the Presidential Salute is and continues to be the music of the first 4 bars, followed by the last 4 bars, of the National Anthem; and to provide for other related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhaingniú gurb é an loinneog chórúil "Amhrán na bhFiann" nó, sa Bhéarla, "The Soldier's Song", leis na liricí nó gan iad, an Rosc Náisiúnta agus go leanann sé de bheith mar an Rosc Náisiúnta; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leagan den Rosc Náisiúnta i dTeanga Chomharthaíochta na hÉireann; do dhaingniú gurb é ceol na chéad 4 bharra den Rosc Náisiúnta agus ceol na 4 bharra deiridh de ina dhiaidh Cúirtéis an Uachtaráin agus go leanann sé de bheith mar Chúirtéis an Uachtaráin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara eile.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Rosc Náisiúnta, 2019

debates.showAs: Health and Safety (Carbon Monoxide) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require all landlords, including publicly funded organisations and other commercial organisations to ensure an annual service and maintenance is carried out on all heat producing carbon monoxide emitting appliances in each tenanted property; and require records to be kept to verify that work was carried out by an authorised person or company; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar gach tiarna talún, lena n-áirítear eagraíochtaí a mhaoinítear go poiblí agus eagraíochtaí tráchtála eile, a chinntiú go ndéanfar seirbhísiú agus cothabháil bhliantúil ar gach fearas táirgthe teasa óna n-astaítear aonocsaíd charbóin i ngach maoin thionóntaithe; agus dá cheangal taifid a choimeád d'fhonn a fhíorú go ndearna duine nó cuideachta údaraithe obair; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta (Aonocsaíd Charbóin), 2017

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Litter Pollution Act 1997 to provide for increased fines where a person is convicted of an offence under that Act; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thruailliú ó Bhruscar, 1997 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le fíneálacha méadaithe i gcás go gciontaítear duine i gcion faoin Acht sin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thruailliú ó Bhruscar (Leasú), 2017
